heading: HR00856
0: RESOLUTION URGING ALL PRIVATE AND PUBLIC TELEVISION STATIONS IN THE COUNTRY TO ALLOT AT LEAST THREE HOURS PER DAY TO EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS THAT FOSTER HOLISTIC LEARNING AND EDUCATION TO KEEP GOVERNMENT ON TRACK IN ITS COMMITMENT TO ACHIEVE THE 17 SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS
status: Pending with the Committee on SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS since 2020-05-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00856
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING ALL PRIVATE AND PUBLIC TELEVISION STATIONS IN THE COUNTRY TO ALLOT AT LEAST THREE HOURS PER DAY TO EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS THAT FOSTER HOLISTIC LEARNING AND EDUCATION TO KEEP GOVERNMENT ON TRACK IN ITS COMMITMENT TO ACHIEVE THE 17 SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS
